revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Jewish letters, or, A correspondence philosophical, historical and critical betwixt a Jew and his correspondents, in different parts. (Jean Baptiste de Boyer, Marq..."
revision.text: Possibly: Jewish letters, or, A correspondence philosophical, historical and critical betwixt a Jew and his correspondents, in different parts. (Jean Baptiste de Boyer, Marquis d'Argens). 4v. (Newcastle : printed by J. White, for James Fleming, Bookseller, on the Tyne-Bridge, 1746). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1422286~S1
